cause.description:
This project aims to increase the education and health levels of the children at Muringato Primary School. Through international collaboration, donations will be secured to help Muringato establish a sustainable feeding program and relocate to a new school structure in a more secure location.
Goal: To raise $60,227.85 to build a new school, plant crops, and facilitate food program.
1. Helping children
cause.mission: Help support Muringato Primary School in Nyeri, Kenya
cause.name: Worldvision
